thread.title: Jim Mott
thread.title_full: Transport Luxury Auto reviewed by Jim Mott

author: Jim Mott
title: Jim Mott
text: The communication with Jackie was excellent. I have dealt with a lot of auto transport companies, most of them tell you anything to get you to commit & then the excuses start. This is my 2nd time with your company & both times worked out great. I told Jackie my time frame & he told me at 1st that was going to be difficult due to the holidays but he was able to come up with a truck that would meet my schedule unless some bad weather hit. It was a California to New York trip. The next day he called after I had already committed and said he had come up with another truck that carried (2) cars & could beat my schedule for $200.00 more. I said great! The trucker was great to work with. I will not call anyone other than Jackie in the future
